⟡ Carter Duong

is a designer and developer from the Bay Area1+2 and based near Los Angeles.3 He graduated from UC San Diego4 with a B.A. in Interdisciplinary Computing and the Arts, and is currently open to full-time or freelance collaborations.

Fashion Quarterly

A student-run publication that explores the culture of style, art, and design at UC San Diego. Writing by Leanza Ellacer and Zach Roberts. Photography by Carter Duong, Lily Tang, and Dora Wang.
